香港金融業職工共同抗疫意見調查

香港金融業職工總會欲以問卷方式詢問同業以工業行動共同抗疫的意願和意見，以制定有效方式向僱主及政府表達對僱員對於安全和健康的憂慮，全民共同抗疫。

由於事態緊急，如策劃任何工業行動必需經過既定程序。故此是次問卷將於1月31日23:59截止。希望同業們積極參與此調查，讓金總能全面理解金融界僱主於防疫措施現況，以及會員和同業於共同抗疫的意願，以制定下一步行動。

The 19-year-old has snubbed the offer of a new deal at Stamford Bridge and the Seagulls have agreed an undisclosed fee with the Blues.

Lamptey had been in talks with Lille over signing a pre-contract agreement to move to France when his contract with Chelsea ran out at the end of this season.

But Brighton boss Graham Potter moved quickly to persuade the defender his best option would be to make the switch to the Amex.

Lamptey made a huge impression in his first team debut for Chelsea in the win at Arsenal and boss Frank Lampard was keen to keep him in his squad.

But the right-back, who can also play midfield, had concerns that his first team opportunities would be limited by competing with Cesar Azpilicueta and Reece James.

Potter sold Lamptey on the prospect of being given the chance to develop with more regular senior football at a club that likes to play football on the ground.
